description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Find upgrades to aid in exploration and combat, fight bosses, and find a way out. *Features retro graphics and nonlinear levels to explore. Includes medals to unlock and drop-in drop-out coop!*
description.short: Find upgrades to aid in exploration and combat, fight bosses, and find a way out. *Features retro graphics and nonlinear levels to explore. Includes medals to unlock and drop-in drop-out coop!*
